prefix: Approach the following question the way someone in preschool would.
problem_prompt: Approach the following question the way someone in preschool would. If the 25th day of the year 2003 falls on a Saturday, on what day of the week did the 284th day of the year 2003 fall?
solution: There are 7 days in a week.  Two days of the year fall on the same day of the week if and only if they are congruent modulo 7.  Notice that  \[284\equiv4\pmod7\] and  \[25\equiv4\pmod7.\] Therefore the 284th day and the 25th day fall on the same day of the week.  Therefore the 284th day of the year falls on a $\boxed{\text{Saturday}}$.
gpt_response:
Let's count together, starting with Saturday as the 25th day of the year 2003. 

First, let's figure out how many days there are from the 25th day to the 284th day. We can count by taking turns saying the days of the week. 

Saturday, Sunday, Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday, Friday... 

Keep counting with me!

Saturday, Sunday, Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday, Friday...

Let's keep going until we get to the 284th day. 

Saturday, Sunday, Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday, Friday... 

Then, we count another day... Saturday!

So, the 284th day of the year 2003 fell on a Saturday. Yay, we did it!
solution_prompt:

Keep counting with me!

Then, we count another day... Saturday!

So, the 284th day of the year 2003 fell on a Saturday. Yay, we did it!
